title: Vote for the #MVBIII Top Players (Testnet)
body:
**Dear Partners,**

With the mission to build a decentralized, and community-driven blockchain ecosystem we need to apply democratic solutions. With the aim of spreading transparency amongst members, we're establishing a **Decentralized Voting Committee for Most Valuable Builder (MVB) Program!**

The pilot will increase the transparency on selection processes and eligibility via a fair voting mechanism to select MVBIII Top Players, including 43+ MVBIII Monthly Stars (from August to October). For those who have the access, you're welcomed to be one of the first batch of stakeholders i.e. Medias/KOLs, MVB Top Players, Mentors, Investors, and BSC Foundation Team. You can qualify/participate in the mentioned categories accordingly. Each type of stakeholder possesses a different level of voting power.

### **[Background](https://www.binance.org/en/blog/the-most-valuable-builder-iii/)**

Most Valuable Builder (MVB) Program is the flagship program under the BSC's $1Billion Growth Fund which aims to provide a support system for BSC-based projects/startups while empowering builders/developers to participate in the decentralized ecossytem and helping their products grow into stable, reliable, and valuable parts of the crypto ecosystem. So far, the MVB Program has now reached its third season. The MVB III: Beyond the Big Bang,the focus is on these areas:

- **High-performance infrastructures:** Strengthen critical infrastructure and provide services to satisfy large-scale business, including (not limited to) security tooling, API and toolings, Cross-chain DeFi Composition, Privacy Txs/Flashbots, bridging CeFi and DeFi, and more.
- **NFT and GamingFi:** Pursue mass adoption opportunities through Gaming, Community (Fan) Tokens, Guild DAO, and more.
- **Advanced DeFi legos:** Build secure, trustless, and holistic DeFi infra to satisfy new DeFi requirements from institutional and professional traders and brokers, including (but not limited to) synthetic assets, real-world assets, efficient AMM, fixed interest rate products, indexing, structural protocols, asset management,etc.

### **Voting Pool**

More details about the list of projects, please click on the attached link. Projects listed below are in alphabetical order.

[<Link 👉：MVBIII Monthly Stars Info>](https://www.notion.so/Link-MVBIII-Monthly-Stars-Info-8ced06822149421bbb6a137dc4b2152d)

### **Rules**

This is a **weighted voting**. Each member may spread voting power across any number of choice. Please cast your votes with the NFT badge you previously claimed on [https://galaxy.eco/bsc](https://galaxy.eco/bsc). It's important to note that **you only have 1 chance to vote** and once the vote is submitted it cannot be edited or changed. 

When the voting phase is over, we will pick **a maximum of 10 projects based on the ranking** as the Final Top Players. 

### **Voting Phase**

November 18th, 1pm UTC- November 23th, 1pm UTC

MVB Top Players will receive significant benefits to boost their development and growth. Please cast your precious votes based on data-backed and insightful evaluation. We appreciate your support and look forward to scaling the program to more members of the community.

Best Regards,

BSC Core Team
author: 0xc1adE4c7419E929EA5eAb55140B44675Bf70D7e7
